thread.section_title: The Pearl Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Pearl Source | www.thepearlsource.com
thread.title: Kim from Texas
thread.title_full: The Pearl Source reviewed by Kim from Texas

author: Kim from Texas
title: Kim from Texas
text:
My husband recently purchased me a 20" strand of AAAA baroque Tahitian pearls. They are beautiful and are just as described. I will treasure them for years to come.
He also purchased me a pair of AAAA Tahitian pearl earrings to match. They are beautiful and they will be treasured as well.
They were both shipped quickly and arrived on time.
I highly recommend purchasing from The Pearl Source. After all, it's all they sell and they know their pearls!
I encourage anyone to go for the higher grade pearls. They truly are gorgeous and will be something you're proud to own and wear.
